name: Devil's Death Collector
description:
In an unfortunate series of events, you accidentally sold your soul to THE NEON DEVIL for a ham sandwich. Don't ask.

Now in return for the chance to earn your freedom, THE NEON DEVIL has asked you to collect other souls for him.

He'll give you a rough description of the person you need to find and then it's up to you to find the correct person. Reach 5000 soul currency to earn your freedom. 

But watch out! THE NEON DEVIL is very impatient so your soul currency will go down over time. THE NEON DEVIL is also very irritable so sending him the wrong targets will cost you 100 soul currency!

Good luck! And maybe don't sell your soul for a sandwich next time!
